action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -xe
# Create array with Zookeeper VM Ips
ZK_IP_ARRAY=(`echo "@@{Zookeeper_Cluster.address}@@" | tr ',' ' '`)
ZK_QUORUM=`echo "${ZK_IP_ARRAY[@]}" | sed 's/ /:2181,/g;s/$/:2181/g'`
# Calculate Solr heap memeory limit(70% of available RAM)
SOLR_JAVA_MEM_MB=`python -c "print(int(0.7*@@{platform.status.resources.memory_size_mib}@@))"`
# Configure Solr
sudo sed -i 's/^#ZK_HOST.*/ZK_HOST="'${ZK_QUORUM}'"/g' /etc/default/solr.in.sh
sudo sed -ri '/SOLR_JAVA_MEM/ s/#//g;s/(Xm)([a-z])([0-9]+)(m)/\1\2'${SOLR_JAVA_MEM_MB}'\4/g' /etc/default/solr.in.sh

sudo service solr start
sudo service solr status

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.name: action_restart

action_list.name: action_create

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -x
DURATION=0
# Function to check zookeeper status, 30 second timeout
check_zookeeper_status() {
OK=$(echo ruok | nc @@{address}@@ 2181)
if [ "$OK" == "imok" ]; then
echo "Zookeeper cluster setup has been completed"
exit 0
elif [ ${DURATION} -lt 30 ]; then
echo "Waiting 5 seconds for Zookeeper cluster setup"
sleep 5
DURATION=$((DURATION+5))
check_zookeeper_status # Repeat Fn call
else
exit 1
echo "Exiting, Zookeeper cluster setup failed after 30 seconds"
fi
}
# Fn call
check_zookeeper_status

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -xe
SOLR_IP_ARRAY=(`echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' ' '`)
TARGET=@@{TARGET_SOLR_IP_TO_MOVE_SHARDS}@@
if [ `echo ${!SOLR_IP_ARRAY[@]} | awk '{print $NF}'` -eq @@{calm_array_index}@@ ]; then
    if [ -z "${TARGET}" ]; then
        echo "IP address of SOLR Node to move shards is mandatory"
    fi
    # Move all replicas in the node before termination
    sudo curl "http://localhost:8983/solr/admin/collections?action=REPLACENODE&sourceNode=${SOLR_IP_ARRAY[-1]}:8983_solr&targetNode=${TARGET}:8983_solr"
else
    echo "Skipping command execution on active nodes"
fi

action_list.description: System action for installing an application
action_list.name: action_install

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -xe
sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y install lsof curl java-1.8.0-openjdk initscripts nc telnet lvm2 iotop
sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb
sudo vgcreate DataVG /dev/sdb
sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -n DataLV DataVG
sudo mkfs.ext4 /dev/DataVG/DataLV

#!/bin/bash -xe

APP_ROOT='/opt/apps'

# SOLR_VERSION=7.6.0
SOLR_VERSION=@@{SOLR_VERSION}@@
SOLR_JAVA_MEM_MB=`python -c "print(int(0.7*@@{platform.status.resources.memory_size_mib}@@))"`

# Set hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

# Configure partitions
sudo mkdir -p "${APP_ROOT}"
echo "/dev/DataVG/DataLV /opt/apps ext4 rw,noatime,nobarrier 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

# Set file and process limits
sudo sed -i '/# End of file/i \
solr    soft    nofile 65000\
solr    hard    nofile 65000\
solr    soft    nproc 65000\
solr    soft    nproc 65000'  /etc/security/limits.conf

# Install Solr
sudo curl -o solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz https://www-us.apache.org/dist/lucene/solr/7.6.0/solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz
sudo tar xzf solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz solr-${SOLR_VERSION}/bin/install_solr_service.sh --strip-components=2
sudo ./install_solr_service.sh solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz -d /opt/apps/solr_data -i /opt/apps -n

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

# SOLR_VERSION=7.6.0

# Configure partitions

sudo mount -a

# Set file and process limits

solr    soft    nofile 65000\

# Install Solr

sudo tar xzf solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz solr-${SOLR_VERSION}/bin/install_solr_service.sh --strip-components=2

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -xe
sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y install lsof curl java-1.8.0-openjdk initscripts nc telnet lvm2 iotop
sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb
sudo vgcreate DataVG /dev/sdb
sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -n DataLV DataVG
sudo mkfs.ext4 /dev/DataVG/DataLV

#!/bin/bash -xe

APP_ROOT='/opt/apps'
# ZK_VERSION=3.4.13
ZK_VERSION=@@{ZK_VERSION}@@
ZK_ROOT='/opt/apps/zookeeper'
ZK_DATA='/opt/apps/zookeeper_data'
# Create array for storing VM IPs
ZK_IP_ARRAY=(`echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' ' '`)
ZK_QUORUM=`echo "${ZK_IP_ARRAY[@]}" | sed 's/ /:2181,/g;s/$/:2181/g'`

# Set hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

# Configure partitions
sudo mkdir -p "${APP_ROOT}"
echo "/dev/DataVG/DataLV /opt/apps ext4 rw,noatime,nobarrier 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a
sudo mkdir -p "${ZK_DATA}"

# Download and install zookeeper
sudo curl https://www-us.apache.org/dist/zookeeper/zookeeper-${ZK_VERSION}/zookeeper-${ZK_VERSION}.tar.gz | sudo tar -C /opt/apps/ -xz
sudo ln -s "/opt/apps/zookeeper-${ZK_VERSION}" "${ZK_ROOT}"
sudo useradd -m zookeeper

# Set Zookeeper myid
echo $((@@{calm_array_index}@@+1)) | sudo tee ${ZK_DATA}/myid

# Build zookeeper config
echo "tickTime=2000
dataDir=${ZK_DATA}
clientPort=2181
initLimit=10
syncLimit=5
$(for i in ${!ZK_IP_ARRAY[@]}; do
echo server.$((${i}+1))=${ZK_IP_ARRAY[${i}]}:2888:3888
done)" | sudo tee ${ZK_ROOT}/conf/zoo.cfg

# Set ownership of all zookeeper directories
sudo chown -R zookeeper:zookeeper /opt/apps/zookeeper*

# Create zookeeper daemon
echo "[Unit]
Description=Zookeeper Daemon
Wants=syslog.target

[Service]
Type=forking
WorkingDirectory=${ZK_ROOT}/
User=zookeeper
ExecStart=${ZK_ROOT}/bin/zkServer.sh start
PIDFile=${ZK_DATA}/zookeeper_server.pid
ExecStop=/bin/kill $MAINPID
SuccessExitStatus=1 143
TimeoutSec=120
Restart=on-failure

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/zookeeper.service

sudo systemctl enable zookeeper
sudo systemctl start zookeeper

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

ZK_IP_ARRAY=(`echo "@@{Zookeeper_Cluster.address}@@" | tr ',' ' '`)

sudo sed -ri '/SOLR_JAVA_MEM/ s/#//g;s/(Xm)([a-z])([0-9]+)(m)/\1\2'${SOLR_JAVA_MEM_MB}'\4/g' /etc/default/solr.in.sh

sudo service solr start
sudo service solr status

#!/bin/bash -x
DURATION=0
# Function to check zookeeper status, 30 second timeout
check_zookeeper_status() {
OK=$(echo ruok | nc @@{address}@@ 2181)
if [ "$OK" == "imok" ]; then
echo "Zookeeper cluster setup has been completed"

DURATION=$((DURATION+5))
check_zookeeper_status # Repeat Fn call

exit 1
echo "Exiting, Zookeeper cluster setup failed after 30 seconds"

}
# Fn call
check_zookeeper_status

sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y install lsof curl java-1.8.0-openjdk initscripts nc telnet lvm2 iotop
sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb
sudo vgcreate DataVG /dev/sdb
sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -n DataLV DataVG
sudo mkfs.ext4 /dev/DataVG/DataLV

#!/bin/bash -xe

APP_ROOT='/opt/apps'

# SOLR_VERSION=7.6.0
SOLR_VERSION=@@{SOLR_VERSION}@@
SOLR_JAVA_MEM_MB=`python -c "print(int(0.7*@@{platform.status.resources.memory_size_mib}@@))"`

# Set hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

# Configure partitions
sudo mkdir -p "${APP_ROOT}"
echo "/dev/DataVG/DataLV /opt/apps ext4 rw,noatime,nobarrier 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a

# Set file and process limits
sudo sed -i '/# End of file/i \
solr    soft    nofile 65000\
solr    hard    nofile 65000\
solr    soft    nproc 65000\
solr    soft    nproc 65000'  /etc/security/limits.conf

# Install Solr
sudo curl -o solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz https://www-us.apache.org/dist/lucene/solr/7.6.0/solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz
sudo tar xzf solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz solr-${SOLR_VERSION}/bin/install_solr_service.sh --strip-components=2
sudo ./install_solr_service.sh solr-${SOLR_VERSION}.tgz -d /opt/apps/solr_data -i /opt/apps -n

#!/bin/bash -xe
sudo yum -y update
sudo yum -y install lsof curl java-1.8.0-openjdk initscripts nc telnet lvm2 iotop
sudo pvcreate /dev/sdb
sudo vgcreate DataVG /dev/sdb
sudo lvcreate -l 100%FREE -n DataLV DataVG
sudo mkfs.ext4 /dev/DataVG/DataLV

#!/bin/bash -xe

APP_ROOT='/opt/apps'
# ZK_VERSION=3.4.13
ZK_VERSION=@@{ZK_VERSION}@@
ZK_ROOT='/opt/apps/zookeeper'
ZK_DATA='/opt/apps/zookeeper_data'
# Create array for storing VM IPs
ZK_IP_ARRAY=(`echo "@@{calm_array_address}@@" | tr ',' ' '`)
ZK_QUORUM=`echo "${ZK_IP_ARRAY[@]}" | sed 's/ /:2181,/g;s/$/:2181/g'`

# Set hostname
sudo hostnamectl set-hostname "@@{name}@@"

# Configure partitions
sudo mkdir -p "${APP_ROOT}"
echo "/dev/DataVG/DataLV /opt/apps ext4 rw,noatime,nobarrier 0 0" | sudo tee -a /etc/fstab
sudo mount -a
sudo mkdir -p "${ZK_DATA}"

# Download and install zookeeper
sudo curl https://www-us.apache.org/dist/zookeeper/zookeeper-${ZK_VERSION}/zookeeper-${ZK_VERSION}.tar.gz | sudo tar -C /opt/apps/ -xz
sudo ln -s "/opt/apps/zookeeper-${ZK_VERSION}" "${ZK_ROOT}"
sudo useradd -m zookeeper

# Set Zookeeper myid
echo $((@@{calm_array_index}@@+1)) | sudo tee ${ZK_DATA}/myid

# Build zookeeper config
echo "tickTime=2000
dataDir=${ZK_DATA}
clientPort=2181
initLimit=10
syncLimit=5
$(for i in ${!ZK_IP_ARRAY[@]}; do
echo server.$((${i}+1))=${ZK_IP_ARRAY[${i}]}:2888:3888
done)" | sudo tee ${ZK_ROOT}/conf/zoo.cfg

# Set ownership of all zookeeper directories
sudo chown -R zookeeper:zookeeper /opt/apps/zookeeper*

# Create zookeeper daemon
echo "[Unit]
Description=Zookeeper Daemon
Wants=syslog.target

[Service]
Type=forking
WorkingDirectory=${ZK_ROOT}/
User=zookeeper
ExecStart=${ZK_ROOT}/bin/zkServer.sh start
PIDFile=${ZK_DATA}/zookeeper_server.pid
ExecStop=/bin/kill $MAINPID
SuccessExitStatus=1 143
TimeoutSec=120
Restart=on-failure

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target" | sudo tee /etc/systemd/system/zookeeper.service

sudo systemctl enable zookeeper
sudo systemctl start zookeeper
